meanings.definition: A colorless, flammable liquid hydrocarbon with the formula C5H10.
meanings.sent1: The pentene was stored carefully due to its flammability.
meanings.sent2: Chemists study the properties of pentene to understand its uses.
meanings.sent3: The pentene decided to join the dance party because it wanted to add some color.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like the scent of pentene.
meanings.sent5: The pentene bubbled and fizzed like a magical potion in the beaker.

meanings.definition: Any of several isomeric hydrocarbons with the formula C5H10, derived from pentane.
meanings.sent1: The different types of pentene have unique chemical structures.
meanings.sent2: Factories produce pentene from pentane for various industrial purposes.
meanings.sent3: The pentene family reunion was a mix of excitement and confusion.
meanings.sent4: His ideas flowed together like the isomers of pentene.
meanings.sent5: The pentene molecules danced around each other in the solution, creating a mesmerizing pattern.
